name: Dear Red (Viut)
description:
I started making this game over almost a year and a half ago, and worked on it on and off for the past year. 

3 months ago I decided I would finish it as best as I could so I could move on to other projects. I know it could use a lot of polish, but I'm still proud of it, it's the first project I sort of finish.

Anyways, enjoy.
